mapper.insert: insert into manage_member(member_email, member_password, member_nickname, member_phonenum) values(#{member_email}, #{member_password}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_phonenum})
mapper.update: update manage_member set member_password=#{member_password} where member_email=#{member_email}
mapper.select: select count(*) from manage_member where member_nickname=#{member_nickname}
select count(*) from manage_member where member_email=#{member_email}
select * from manage_member where member_email=#{member_email} and member_password=#{member_password}
